title: Revamp Your Closet: The Complete Guide
headline: Master the skill of revamping a closet and kickstart your career as a professional organiser in this free online course.
description: ‘Closet revamping’ is the process of reorganising your wardrobe. But does the idea of cleaning your closet induce panic attacks? Do you have an urge for a closet makeover but are unsure how to do it within a tight budget? This course will show you how to arrange your closet with clothes and accessories that make you feel confident with little or no shopping. You will also discover how to turn these organisational skills into a profession.
courseDescription:
Are you tired of wading through your messy closet every morning and wondering why you have so many clothes but nothing to wear? Do you have an important social event to attend but do not want to buy a new outfit? Then it is time to reorganise your wardrobe, put together new outfits from old staples and creatively style what you already have in the closet. We will introduce you to the concept of closet revamping and its importance. Simplify your daily life by paying attention to your wardrobe, which is a perfect start to managing the rest of your home. Do you go through the struggle of figuring out how to create space for everything you own? In this course, we will help you generate more space, bring order to your wardrobe and refresh your style.

The first step to organising a closet is to declutter it and devise a plan for storage and reorganisation. Is your bedroom closet jam-packed with clothes, heavy coats and jackets, towels, pillow covers, kids' toys and more? We will help you understand the different types of cupboards, their location in your home, what to store in them and the correct procedure for storage. You will have a clear idea of how to custom design closets that suit your home plan and how to add shelves or build a new one within your budget. Explore the pros and cons of renting instead of buying clothes for special occasions. You'll learn about invaluable money-saving tips that you may use for both offline and online clothing transactions.

Did you know that with your revamping skills, you can start a career in helping others plan and organise their space? Today, many people hire professional organisers to update their wardrobe and create a capsule wardrobe to make them look stylish. We will teach you how to become a professional organiser, start your own business and the best ways to gain clients. You will also learn about the Association of Professional Declutterers and Organisers (APDO) and its role in the declutterer and professional organiser industry. If you seek to start a career in professional organising, this course is the ideal place to start. Whether you are a fresher with no experience or someone in the organising industry who wants to refresh your skills and knowledge, you will benefit from this course. So join today and get ready to say ‘goodbye’ to disorganised wardrobes and closets.
